= fibnacci =

F0 = 0

F1 = F2 = 1

Fn = F(n-1) + F(n-2)

== property ==
SUM(Fi),0<=i<=n = F(n+2) - 1

SUM(i*Fi),1<=i<=n = n*F(n+2) - F(n+3) + 2

Lucas'Therem::
GCD(Fm, Fn) = F(GCD(m, n))

Cassini's Formula/Simson's Relation::
F(n+1)*F(n-1) = (Fn)^2 + (-1)^n

Shifting Property::
F(m+n) = Fm*F(n+1) + F(m-1)*Fn

Fn = (phi^n - (1-phi)^n)/sqrt(5)
